info.description: A 3D experience built with Three.js & webGL. I'm interested in learning about game development and wanted to learn about the world of particle systems. Allows a user to customize a galaxy, makes for a nice desktop display!
A responsive photography website and print store, designed with a mobile first approach. Uses Redux Toolkit to manage state, Stripe for payments and billing, and Cloudflare CDN for deployment
Playfully designed, inspired by pastel 70's style using CocktailDB. Made for bartenders who need to brainstorm ideas for drink specials, and party people

A real-time chat application using websockets via socket.io. Made in the the style of AIM from the early 2000s. Allows a user to create a screennem and private room, other users can join that room given the code and chat with each other, recieving instantaneous updates. Yes, it even contains those familiar AIM notification sounds!
Designed and built a fully responsive landing page for the HURON hotel, inspired by a clean and minimal Japanese aesthetic
